# Pull Request

## Description

Provide a clear description of the changes in this pull request.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Feature - New functionality
- [ ] Fix - Bug resolution
- [ ] Refactor - Code restructuring without behavior change
- [ ] Style - Visual or CSS modifications
- [ ] Performance - Optimization improvements
- [ ] Documentation - Content or comment updates
- [ ] Chore - Maintenance or configuration

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows established style conventions
- [ ] Type definitions are complete and accurate
- [ ] Component structure matches existing patterns
- [ ] Responsive design tested across breakpoints
- [ ] Accessibility standards maintained
- [ ] No debug code or console logs remain
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional format
